A Thousand Cuts.Description: Whenever you play a card, deal 1 (2) damage to ALL enemies.
A Thousand Cuts.Name: A Thousand Cuts

After Image.Description: (Innate.) Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.

Aggregate.Description: Gain 1 Energy for every 6(5) cards in your draw pile.
Aggregate.Name: Aggregate

All For One.Description: Deal 10(14) damage. Put all Cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand.
All For One.Name: All For One

All Out Attack.Description: Deal 10 (14) damage to ALL enemies. Draw 1 less card next turn.

Amplify.Description: This turn, your next (1(2)) Power(s) is (are) played twice.
Amplify.Name: Amplify

Ancient Tea Set.Description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 Energy.

Anger.Description: Deal 5(7) damage. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

Apotheosis.Description: Upgrade ALL of your cards for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

Armaments.Description: Gain 5 Block. Upgrade a(ALL) card(s) in your hand for the rest of combat.

Art of War.Description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.
Art of War.Name: Art of War

Ascender's Bane.Description: Unplayable. Cannot be removed from your deck.
Ascender's Bane.Name: Ascender's Bane

Astrolabe.Description: Upon pickup, choose and Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.

Auto-Shields.Description: If you have 0 Block, gain 11(15) Block.

Bane.Description: Deal 7 (10) damage. If the enemy is Poisoned, deal 7 (10) damage again.
Bane.Name: Bane

Barrage.Description: Deal 4(6) damage for each Channeled Orb.

Barricade.Description: Block no longer expires at the start of your turn.

Battle Trance.Name: Battle Trance

Berserk.Description: Gain 5 Vulnerable. Gain Energy at the start of each turn.

Blizzard.Description: Deal damage equal to 2(3) times the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.

Blood for Blood.Description: Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose HP in combat. Deal 18(22) damage.

Blur.Description: Gain 5 (8) Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

Bottled Tornado.Description: Upon pick up, choose a Power card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.
Bottled Tornado.Name: Bottled Tornado

Bouncing Flask.Description: Apply 3 poison to a random enemy 3 (4) times.

Bronze Scales.Description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.

Brutality.Description: (Innate.) At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.

Buffer.Description: Prevent the next (1(2)) time(s) you would lose HP.

Burn.Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, take 2 (4) damage.

Burst.Description: This turn your next 1 Skill is (2 Skills are) played twice.

Chill.Description: (Innate.) Channel 1 Frost for each enemy in combat (per enemy in combat). Exhaust.

Claw.Description: Deal 3 damage. All Claw cards deal 2(3) additional damage this combat.

Reckless Charge.Name: Reckless Charge

Self Repair.Description: At the end of combat, heal 7(10) HP.
Self Repair.Name: Self Repair

Self-Forming Clay.Description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn.
Self-Forming Clay.Name: Self-Forming Clay

Sentinel.Description: Gain 5(8) Block. If this card is Exhausted, gain 2(3) energy.
Sentinel.Name: Sentinel

Setup.Description: Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It cost 0 until it is played.
Setup.Name: Setup

Sever Soul.Description: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Deal 16(20) damage.
Sever Soul.Name: Sever Soul

Shiv.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage. Exhaust.  ''(Obtained from the effects of various cards.)''
Shiv.Name: Shiv

Shockwave.Description: Apply 3(5) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust.
Shockwave.Name: Shockwave

Shovel.Description: You can now Dig for loot at Rest Sites.
Shovel.Name: Shovel

Shuriken.Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
Shuriken.Name: Shuriken

Singing Bowl.Description: When adding cards to your deck, you may gain +2 Max HP instead.
Singing Bowl.Name: Singing Bowl

Skewer.Description: Spend all Energy. Deal 7 (10) damage X times.
Skewer.Name: Skewer

Smiling Mask.Description: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.
Smiling Mask.Name: Smiling Mask

Snecko Eye.Description: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat Confused.
Snecko Eye.Name: Snecko Eye

Snecko Skull.Description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.
Snecko Skull.Name: Snecko Skull

Sozu.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer obtain potions.
Sozu.Name: Sozu

Spot Weakness.Description: If an enemy intends to attack, gain 3(4) Strength.
Spot Weakness.Name: Spot Weakness

Stack.Description: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile (+3).
Stack.Name: Stack

Static Discharge.Description: Whenever you take attack damage, Channel 1(2) Lightning.
Static Discharge.Name: Static Discharge

Steam Power.Description: Draw 2(3) cards. Add a Burn into your discard pile.
Steam Power.Name: Steam Power

Storm.Description: (Innate.) Whenever you play a Power, Channel 1 Lightning.
Storm.Name: Storm

Storm of Steel.Description: Discard your hand. Add 1 (Upgraded) Shiv to your hand for each card discarded.
Storm of Steel.Name: Storm of Steel

Strange Spoon.Description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.
Strange Spoon.Name: Strange Spoon

Streamline.Description: Deal 15(20) damage. Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by 1 for this combat.
Streamline.Name: Streamline

Sunder.Description: Deal 24(32) damage. If this kills the enemy, gain 3 Energy.
Sunder.Name: Sunder

Sundial.Description: Every 3 times you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Energy.
Sundial.Name: Sundial

Sweeping Beam.Description: Deal 5(8) damage to ALL enemies. Draw 1 card.
Sweeping Beam.Name: Sweeping Beam

Sword Boomerang.Description: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3(4) times.
Sword Boomerang.Name: Sword Boomerang

TURBO.Description: Gain 2(3) Energy. Add a Void into your discard pile.
TURBO.Name: TURBO

Tactician.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, gain 1 (2) Energy.
Tactician.Name: Tactician

The Courier.Description: The merchant no longer runs out of cards, relics, or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%.
The Courier.Name: The Courier

The Specimen.Description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.
The Specimen.Name: The Specimen

Thinking Ahead.Description: Draw 2 cards. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust. (Don't Exhaust)
Thinking Ahead.Name: Thinking Ahead

Thread and Needle.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 5 Plated Armor.
Thread and Needle.Name: Thread and Needle

Thunder Strike.Description: Deal 7(9) damage to a random enemy for each Lightning Channeled this combat.
Thunder Strike.Name: Thunder Strike

Thunderclap.Description: Deal 4(7) damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Thunderclap.Name: Thunderclap

Tingsha.Description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.
Tingsha.Name: Tingsha

Tiny Chest.Description: Gain 30 Gold. You are 10% more likely to find treasure in Map Locations|? rooms.
Tiny Chest.Name: Tiny Chest

Tiny House.Description: Obtain 1 potion. Gain 30 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 Random card.
Tiny House.Name: Tiny House

Toolbox.Description: At the start of each combat, add a random colorless card to your hand.
Toolbox.Name: Toolbox

Tools of the Trade.Description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.
Tools of the Trade.Name: Tools of the Trade

Torii.Description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.
Torii.Name: Torii

Tough Bandages.Description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.
Tough Bandages.Name: Tough Bandages

Toxic Egg.Description: Whenever you add a Skill card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
Toxic Egg.Name: Toxic Egg

Toy Ornithopter.Description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 3 HP.
Toy Ornithopter.Name: Toy Ornithopter

Transmutation.Description: Add X random (Upgraded) colorless cards into your hand. Exhaust.
Transmutation.Name: Transmutation

True Grit.Description: Gain 7(9) Block. Exhaust a random(not random) card from your hand.
True Grit.Name: True Grit

Unceasing Top.Description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.
Unceasing Top.Name: Unceasing Top

Underhanded Strike.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, deal 7 (10) damage to a random enemy.
Underhanded Strike.Name: Underhanded Strike

Undo.Description: Set your HP to what it was last turn. Exhaust.
Undo.Name: Undo

Unload.Description: Deal 12 (16) damage. Discard ALL non-Attack cards.
Unload.Name: Unload

Uppercut.Description: Deal 13 damage. Apply 1(2) Weak. Apply 1(2) Vulnerable.
Uppercut.Name: Uppercut

Vajra.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.
Vajra.Name: Vajra

Velvet Choker.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.
Velvet Choker.Name: Velvet Choker

Void.Description: Unplayable. When this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy.  Ethereal.
Void.Name: Void

War Paint.Description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills.
War Paint.Name: War Paint

Warcry.Description: Draw 1(2) card(s). Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Warcry.Name: Warcry

Well-Laid Plans.Description: At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 (2) card(s).
Well-Laid Plans.Name: Well-Laid Plans

Whetstone.Description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.
Whetstone.Name: Whetstone

Whirlwind.Description: Deal 5(8) damage to ALL enemies X times.
Whirlwind.Name: Whirlwind

White Noise.Description: Add a random Power to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
White Noise.Name: White Noise

Wild Strike.Description: Deal 12(17) damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.
Wild Strike.Name: Wild Strike

Wraith Form.Description: Gain 3 (4) Intangible. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.
Wraith Form.Name: Wraith Form
